mapper.select: select count(c.foodMName) from (select foodMName,sum(inAmount) inAmount,sum(outAmount) outAmount,unit from foodminven group by foodMName) c
select foodMName,sum(inAmount) inAmount,sum(outAmount) outAmount,unit from foodminven group by foodMName having foodMName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select b.sideDName, sum(a.dietAmount) as dietAmount, a.orderItemCode, d.orderItemName from orderlist a join sidedish b join dietinfo c join orderitem d where a.dietCode = c.dietCode and c.sideDCode = b.sideDCode and a.orderItemCode = d.orderItemCode and a.orderItemCode = 3 group by b.sideDName

select b.sideDName, sum(a.dietAmount) as dietAmount, a.orderItemCode, d.orderItemName from orderlist a join sidedish b join dietinfo c join orderitem d where a.dietCode = c.dietCode and c.sideDCode = b.sideDCode and a.orderItemCode = d.orderItemCode and a.orderItemCode = 5 group by b.sideDName

select a.orderCode, b.sideDName,b.sideDImg, sum(a.dietAmount) as dietAmount, a.orderItemCode, d.orderItemName from orderlist a join sidedish b join dietinfo c join orderitem d where a.dietCode = c.dietCode and c.sideDCode = b.sideDCode and a.orderItemCode = d.orderItemCode and a.orderItemCode = 3 group by b.sideDName

select oo.sideDCode, sum(oc.dietAmount) cookingAmount,oc.orderItemName,sd.sideDName,sd.sideDImg from orderoptions oo, (select a.orderCode, a.dietAmount,b.orderItemName from orderList a,(select DISTINCT o.orderCode,oi.orderItemName from orderoptions o, orderitem oi where o.orderItemCode = 3 and o.orderItemCode=oi.orderItemCode) b where a.orderCode=b.orderCode) oc, sidedish sd where orderItemCode = 3 and oo.orderCode = oc.orderCode and oo.sideDCode=sd.sideDCode and sd.sideDCode=oo.sideDCode group by oo.sideDCode

select a.orderCode, b.dietName, b.dietImg,a.orderItemCode, a.orderDate, c.orderItemName from orderlist a join diet b join orderitem c where a.dietCode = b.dietCode and a.orderItemCode = c.orderItemCode and a.orderItemCode = 4 group by b.dietName order by a.orderDate limit 0,3

select a.orderCode, b.dietName, b.dietImg,a.orderItemCode, a.orderDate, c.orderItemName from orderlist a join diet b join orderitem c where a.dietCode = b.dietCode and a.orderItemCode = c.orderItemCode and a.orderItemCode = 5 group by b.dietName order by a.orderDate limit 0,3

select a.orderCode,a.sideDCode,a.orderItemName,a.orderItemCode optionsOrderItemCode,sum(b.dietAmount) cookingAmount,c.sideDName,c.sideDImg from (select o.orderCode,o.sideDCode,oi.orderItemName,oi.orderItemCode from orderoptions o, orderitem oi where o.orderItemCode=oi.orderItemCode and (oi.orderItemCode=3 or oi.orderItemCode=4)) a, orderlist b, sidedish c where a.orderCode=b.orderCode and c.sideDCode=a.sideDCode group by sideDCode

select a.orderCode,a.sideDCode,a.orderItemName,a.orderItemCode optionsOrderItemCode,sum(b.dietAmount) cookingAmount,c.sideDName,c.sideDImg from (select o.orderCode,o.sideDCode,oi.orderItemName,oi.orderItemCode from orderoptions o, orderitem oi where o.orderItemCode=oi.orderItemCode and (oi.orderItemCode=3)) a, orderlist b, sidedish c where a.orderCode=b.orderCode and c.sideDCode=a.sideDCode group by sideDCode

select count(c.orderCode) from (select a.orderCode as orderCode, a.sideDCode as sideDCode, c.sideDImg as sideDImg, c.sideDName as sideDName, b.orderItemCode as orderOrderItemCode, a.orderItemCode as optionsOrderItemCode, sum(b.dietAmount) as cookingAmount from orderoptions a, orderlist b, sidedish c where a.orderCode = b.orderCode and a.sideDCode = c.sideDCode group by sideDcode having optionsOrderItemCode = 3) c

select a.orderCode as orderCode, a.sideDCode as sideDCode, c.sideDImg as sideDImg, c.sideDName as sideDName, b.orderItemCode as orderOrderItemCode, a.orderItemCode as optionsOrderItemCode, sum(b.dietAmount) as cookingAmount, d.orderItemName from orderoptions a, orderlist b, sidedish c, orderitem d where a.orderCode = b.orderCode and a.orderItemCode = d.orderItemCode and a.sideDCode = c.sideDCode group by sideDcode having optionsOrderItemCode = 5 limit #{startRecord},#{recordsPerPage};

select count(c.orderCode) from (select a.orderCode as orderCode, a.sideDCode as sideDCode, c.sideDImg as sideDImg, c.sideDName as sideDName, b.orderItemCode as orderOrderItemCode, a.orderItemCode as optionsOrderItemCode, sum(b.dietAmount) as cookingAmount from orderoptions a, orderlist b, sidedish c where a.orderCode = b.orderCode and a.sideDCode = c.sideDCode group by sideDcode having optionsOrderItemCode = 5) c
mapper.update: update orderoptions set orderItemCode= #{orderItemCode} where sideDCode = #{sideDCode};

update orderlist set orderItemCode = 5 where orderCode= (select a.orderCode from (select oo.orderCode, count(oo.orderItemCode) countCode from orderoptions oo,orderList ol where oo.orderCode = ol.orderCode and ol.orderItemCode=3 and oo.orderItemCode=5 group by oo.orderCode) a where a.countCode = 6)
